Pantheon: This… This is the necklace, which my wife presented Down [sarilu]. [O]! [Saril]… Thanks! Although some memory about my son. As much time is past… It cannot be been subdued down death of son… It cannot be become accustomed down this pain. UV- f… I hope, more it will not be victims. Them there must not be. It is differently cannot! But you step to [Verkhovnomu] priest Of [prane], which is located [pered] Of [administratsiey]. Your mission on this island is finished, be prepared at the point of the journey beside the large peace.
